entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gillam Airport 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
